settings.forceDetectionDescription: This setting forces the app to treat the text as being in a specific language, bypassing automatic detection. Use this when working with languages that may be confused with each other. When a language is selected (other than "Auto-detect"), the app will only accept text in that language and will display an error message if the text appears to be in a different language.
